shortdesc.ph: Used to retrieve audio device information.
Indicates whether the audio device supports ultra-low latency capture and playback.

section.note: This class is only applicable to the Android platform.

plentry.pd:
Whether the audio device supports ultra-low latency capture and playback:
: The device supports ultra-low latency capture and playback.
: The device does not support ultra-low latency capture and playback.

Indicates whether ultra-low latency audio capture and playback is supported:
